abstract: While the tumultuous markets have decimated many investors’ holdings, private equity chief Leon D. Black saw one of his physical holdings collapse as well.
snippet: While the tumultuous markets have decimated many investors’ holdings, private equity chief Leon D. Black saw one of his physical holdings collapse as well.
lead_paragraph: The tumult in the markets has razed many an investor’s portfolios. But in an unfortunate coincidence earlier this week, Leon D. Black, the private equity magnate, saw one of his physical holdings collapse as well.

headline.main: Buyout Mogul Suffers Different Kind of Loss
